name: kernel - boot
info:
when flow start, this part launch all sub flows
devices registration must be called from this part output

name: kernel - device
info: devices must register their definitions to this part input

name: kenel - gate
info:
gate can be opened or closed
When closed, all messages are stopped from MQTT links and kernel

name: convert minute from midnight to hour
kernel - read and write to file
kernel - cron
info:
cron minute = every minutes from flow start
cron hour = every hours from flow start
cron day = every day at 3 am

name: device - system kernel version
info: this is a fake device for kernel boot (ensure that one device is registered)

name: check device
check if device exists in global metrics
reset all global variables and launch complete cycle
set gate message
check if global devices has metric
check if value is different from global metric
check metric
Si plus de 12 messages par seconde pendant 4 secondes alors bloque le kernel pendant 1 seconde
set gate message
journal console only linky and power
write file contents to global metrics
60 s after boot and every day at 3am
60 s after boot and every hour
60 s after boot and every minute
influxdb must have "resume", "linky", "system", "home", "unifi" buckets, and one bucket per room
minute to HH:mm
